<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7929651e05b081fe55e0e745725a7ad78c51be16|patch 8.2.0427: it is not possible to check for a typo in a feature name>
patch 8.2.0427: it is not possible to check for a typo in a feature name

Problem:    It is not possible to check for a typo in a feature name.
Solution:   Add an extra argument to has().

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0427: it is not possible to check for a typo in a feature name · vim/vim@7929651
attachments.text: Problem: It is not possible to check for a typo in a feature name. Solution: Add an extra argument to has().
attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0427: it is not possible to check for a typo in a feature name · vim/vim@7929651

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d5bc32df207eae408263ae6ab737771365d0bca1|patch 8.2.0428: buffer name may leak>
patch 8.2.0428: buffer name may leak

Problem:    Buffer name may leak.
Solution:   Free the buffer name before overwriting it.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0428: buffer name may leak · vim/vim@d5bc32d
attachments.text: Problem: Buffer name may leak. Solution: Free the buffer name before overwriting it.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c5a8fdc42dbd304598b2d73db754c7b97665b182|patch 8.2.0429: no warning when test checks for option that never exists>
patch 8.2.0429: no warning when test checks for option that never exists

Problem:    No warning when test checks for option that never exists.
Solution:   In tests check that the option can exist.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0429: no warning when test checks for option that never exists · vim/vim@c5a8fdc
attachments.text: Problem: No warning when test checks for option that never exists. Solution: In tests check that the option can exist.
